old:
<COL 78f5ff>絶望の大陸 第二節：「展望城の戦い」到達！</COL>

　“数多の命、財、文化、誇り
　　奪われたものは数知れず

　　絶望の支配するその地において成し遂げられた
　　象徴たる展望城の奪還

　　その時、まさに形となった希望が
　　王国の民の目に映ることとなった――”
new:
<COL 78f5ff>The Land of Despair, Part 2: "The Battle of Lookout Castle" Is unlocked!</COL>

"Countless lives, riches, culture, and pride have been taken away. In the land dominated by despair, the symbolic recapture of Lookout Castle has been achieved. 

At that moment, hope, which had taken form, appeared before the eyes of the kingdom's people—"

old:
苛烈な戦いの末、あなたの助力により
ついに《展望城》が王家の手に戻ることとなりました

今後さらに猛攻をしかけてくるであろう
魔軍との戦いに備え、戦力を充実させましょう

また、奪還されたばかりの展望城では
早くもあなたを待つ声が響いているようです
new:
With your assistance, after a fierce battle, Lookout Castle has finally been returned to the royal family. 

In preparation for the upcoming relentless attacks from the Demon Army, let us strengthen our forces. 

Furthermore, the newly retaken Lookout Castle already seems to be filled with voices eagerly awaiting your arrival.
